衽字的基本解释

衽
rèn
衣襟：“连衽成帷”。敛衽。
衣袖。
古代睡觉时用的席子：衽席。

衽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rèn］
［《廣韻》汝鴆切，去沁，日。］
亦作“袵1”。
(1)衣襟。指上衣前交领部分。
(2)衣襟。指上衣两旁形如燕尾的掩裳际处。
(3)衣襟。泛指上衣的前幅。
(4)整理衣襟。
(5)衣袖。
(6)卧席。指床褥。
(7)引申为寝宿。参见“衽金革”。
(8)连结棺盖与棺木的木榫。两头宽，中间窄，形似衽，故名。汉人名“小腰”。

衽字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　衽； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1113第03
【唐韻】【正韻】汝鴆切【集韻】如鴆切，?音妊。【類篇】衣襟也。【揚子·方言】褸謂之衽。【釋名】衽，襜也。在傍襜襜如也。【禮·玉藻】衽當旁。【註】衽，謂裳幅所交裂也。　又【禮·曲禮】請衽何趾。【註】衽，臥席也。【周禮·天官·玉府】掌王之燕衣服衽席。【註】衽席，單席也。　又【禮·檀弓】棺束?二衡三衽每束一。【疏】小要也。其形兩頭廣，中央小也，旣不用釘棺，但先鑿棺邊及兩頭合際處作坎形，則以小要連之。今因漢時呼衽爲小要也。又【屈原·離騷】跪敷衽以陳辭兮。【註】衽，衣前也。　又【博雅】衽、裀、袾、?，裑也。　又【集韻】忍甚切，音稔。義同。　又【類篇】或作?，通作袵。

考證：〔【周禮·天官·王府】掌王之燕衣服衽席。〕　謹照原文王府改玉府。
衽字的源字形

衽字的起名意思

衣襟。

Gusset
Basic explanation of words
Gusset
rèn
Lapel: "Lian gusset into a curtain". Converge.
Sleeves.
Ancient mat used to sleep: gusset.
Gusset
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［rèn］
["Guangyun" Ru Xun cut, go to Qin, day. ]
Also known as "袵1".
(1) The placket. Refers to the front collar part of the jacket.
(2) The placket. Refers to the edge of the skirt on both sides of the coat that is shaped like a dovetail.
(3) The placket. Refers to the front panel of the jacket in general.
(4) Organize the placket.
(5) Sleeves.
(6) Sleeping seats. Refers to the mattress.
(7) Extended to sleep and sleep. See "Golden Leather".
(8) The wooden dowel connecting the coffin lid and the coffin. It is wide at both ends and narrow in the middle, which resembles a gusset, hence the name. The Chinese name is "Xiaoyao".
Gusset
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　衽; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1113 Page 03
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ru Yuan cut [Ji Yun] Like a dragon cut, the sound is pregnant. 【Classes】Clothes also. 【Yangtze Dialect】The coat is called 衽. [Release name] 衽, 襜 also. In the vicinity of 襜襜, such as also. [Li·Yuzao] Beside it. [Note] 衽, said that the clothes are split.　[Li·Qu Li] Please He Zhi. [Note] 衽, also lying on the table. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Yu Mansion】The clothes of Zhang Wangzhiyan. 【Note】Single seats are also available.　[Li·Tan Gong] Coffin bundles? One for each bundle of two scales and three gussets. [Sparse] Xiao Yao also. Its shape is wide at both ends and small in the center. You don't need to nail the coffin, but first cut the edge of the coffin and make a ridge at the junction of the two ends, then connect it with the small ones. Today, because of the Han Dynasty, calling 衽 is a small important person. And [Qu Yuan·Lisao] Kneeling and applying 衽 to give the old words. [Note] 衽, also before the clothes.　[Bo Ya] 衽, Yin, 袾,?, 裑也.　[Jiyun] To endure everything, sound Minoru. The same meaning.　[Classes] or writing?, through writing. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Wang Mansion] Zhang Wangzhiyan's clothes and seats. 〕 　I would like to change the Royal Mansion to the Yu Mansion according to the original text.

Общество
Пиктофонетические символы.
Yi (ネ) выражает смысл, сценарий печати похож на пальто, что означает, что ластовица является частью одежды; Ren (ren) выражает звук, ren имеет большое значение, что означает, что область одежда больше.
Первоначальное значение - одежда.
